this_title: Lego Star Wars: The Yoda Chronicles - Menace of the Sith
trans_title: 乐高星球大战：尤达编年史之西斯的威胁
introduction: Darth Sidious shows off the new Sith clone JEK who is an extremely powerful weapon. But JEK wants to be his own master and suddenly, both the Jedi and the Sith try to win him over. It now remains to be seen which side he chooses.
chinese_title: 乐高星球大战：尤达编年史之西斯的威胁
foreign_title: Lego Star Wars: The Yoda Chronicles - Menace of the Sith
